gato bochor o?

Tumi appointment ta front e set korte paro. Thik. Amra kichu khujbo je tumar schedule er sathe ar amar schedule er sathe match kore. Intake e wrap up kora aage, tumi mone koro, intake er shuru te tumi mention korechile je tumi gato 30 din e kichu suicidal thoughts niye chintito, eta indicate korechile ar ami bollen je amra ei topic e firbo. Tai, ami ei topic ta niye briefly touch korte chai break er aage. Tumi amake bolte paro je suicidal ideations gulo ki chilo tumar?

Dekho, eta temon na je ami chinta kori Ami ki gun niye amar brain gulo blow kore dibo kichu erokom. Ami chaichi light off kore ghumate jabo ar ami jai ar ghumate thaki. Ami vabi je jodi ami ekhon ghumate jai ar kalke na jage, jani na, kemon hobe?
Mane, ekta passive suicidal thinking process. Tumi ki kono intent ache nijer khoti korte? Ba kono plan ache nijer khoti korte.

ha.

Jodi ei suicidal thoughts gulo aro prominent hoye jay, tahole ki korbe? Cholo ekta plan kori ei niye. Ami predict kori na ba asha kori na je eta hobe, ar ami kono karon e mone kori na je hobe, kintu ami prepared thakte chai. Ami chaichi tumi o prepared thako just in case, mone hoi sometimes ei thoughts gulo ashe, mone hoi sometimes tumi ekdom vabcho na, ar sometimes ektu strong hoye jay. So jodi ora strong hoye jay, jodi market change hoye jay, thik ache, so eta less passive hoye jay ar beshi. Tumi plan niye vabte shuru koro ba erokom kichu. Amake bolo tumi ki korbe?

Tumi bollcho tumi tomar sister ba tomar husband ke call korte paro, ar jodi tara available na hoy, ami plan ta ektu upore niye jete pari.
Ami amar best friend ke call korte pari. Ha, jodi amra onek din kotha na hoi, ami jekono somoy call korte pari. Mone hoi, kono somoyi jay ni.

Ar ami encourage korte chai, ami jani intake e tumi je kichu bollcho, tumi down feel korcho, tumi coworkers er sathe bhalo relate korte parcho na, mone hoi tumi nijer kache disappointed feel korcho kivabe tumi tomar bachcha der ar husband er sathe relate korcho. Amra figure out korbo jokhon amra move korbo ar work toward a diagnosis. Kintu jokhon tumi therapy te commit korbe, ar counseling e regularly asbe, ami asha kori ei symptoms improve hobe. Ar onek somoy hoi, obviously ami guarantee korte pari na, kintu onek somoy hoi. Tai ami chaichi tumi bujho je asha rakha valuable, ar bhalo jinisher dike takano. Ar bujho je tumi ekta boro step niye eshecho ekhane ajke. Ar eta kothin chilo, sob question er answer dite, sob kichu rehash korte. Ar counseling er kaj nijei challenging hote pare. Kintu ami mone kori eta worth it. Jodi eta bhalo chance thake, ami mone kori thake, tomader feel improve korar. Tai ami tomader commitment er jonno applause kori, encourage kori je tumi first session e asho ar prottek session e asho ar ei process ta diye really work koro.
